casebody.data:
Dawn Weideman
v.
Erin Atalie Shelton
v.
Annette Wise, Intervenor No. 254P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2017 Paul Louis Bidwell, Attorney at Law, Douglas A. Ruley, Attorney at Law, Asheville, for Wise, Annette. Jessica A. Walters, Attorney at Law. Patrick S. McCroskey, Attorney at Law, Asheville, for Weideman, Dawn. Janee J. Garcia, Attorney at Law, for Shelton, Erin Atalie.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 8th of July 2016 by Intervenor in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of January 2017."
